about_the_game:
Dare & Scare is a 4 player online co-op horror game. You are a contestant on DARE & SCARE a game show about exploring haunted locations and completing dares and challenges to discover their sinister truths. Use your wits and courage to complete your tasks and just maybe you'll make it out alive.

SURVIVE THE GAMES

Survive haunted locations while completing a series of dares to earn rewards. Complete them all and you will be allowed to leave.

Discover hidden secrets behind these supernatural locations and perhaps even about the games themselves.

MULTIPLAYERPlay together with your friends where you complete dares as a team

content_descriptors.notes: Pixelated non realistic violence including decapitation and other forms of lethal assault.

name: Dare & Scare

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

You are a contestant on DARE & SCARE a game show about exploring haunted locations and completing dares and challenges to discover their sinister truths. Use your wits and courage to complete your tasks and just maybe you'll make it out alive.
